title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-7.24 - First-aid supplies and personal medications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-7.24 - First-aid supplies and personal medications

State Regulations

Retail food store employee first-aid supplies and
personal medications shall be stored in a way that prevents them from
contaminating food and food-contact surfaces. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
§§
271-7.24

Repealed

New

York State Register June 22, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 25, eff. 6/22/2016

Adopted

New

York State Register December 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 51, eff. 12/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
